import React, {useState} from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faShoppingCart, faSignInAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' const Header: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const username = localStorage.getItem('name_key') const [passwordShown, setPasswordShown] = useState(false) const togglePasswordVisibility: () => void = () => { setPasswordShown(!passwordShown) } return (
EdiCoffee Shop
{username} localStorage.clear()} href="/login" className="transition duration-150 ease-in-out transform hover:-translate-y-1 hover:scale-110 text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-900 focus:outline-none mx-4 sm:mx-0" >
Home Products Cart
) } export default Header
